about_the_game:
THE STELLAR ARMADA MOVES FORWARD WITH ITS PLAN ...
With our main hero temporarily unable to continue his quest and a great mantle of ignorance covering the planet Earth, the possibilities of interplanetary armed conflict grow exponentially and the Stellar Armada prepares for its final attack. In this second installment of Stellar Mess, it will rest upon "the four", a group of self-assembled rebels, to help Diego regain his freedom and rescue the only person capable of fixing this mess, Princess Lanor.

THE REBELLION IS IN TROUBLE...
At the other end of the galaxy the rebellion is exposed to an unexpected attack front commanded by an imposter of the captive princess with no chance of being warned of the imminent danger looming over their last bastion.

A HOPE-COLORED ANDROID ...
Harry the interactive conversational android contains vital information about the whereabouts of the Princess.

KEY FEATURES OF THE GAME ...
2D RETRO-STYLE POINT-AND-CLICK ADVENTURE - Travel back to the 80s in this faithfull reproduction of the adventure games from that decade.
16 COLOR PALETTE - Enjoy the artwork done in EGA 16 color palette.
9VERBS UI - Enjoy the experience of the mythical 9verbs UI in point-and-clicks adventure games.
FUN PUZZLE DESIGN - Enjoy a fun-oriented puzzle design derive from lightweight storyline.

name: Stellar Mess: Operation Kush (Chapter 2)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows ME or higher
  • Processor: Pentium or higher
  • Memory: 64 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 640x360, 32-bit colour
  • DirectX: Version 5.2
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Sound Card: All DirectX-compatible sound cards
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows ME or higher
  • Processor: Pentium or higher
  • Memory: 64 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 640x360, 32-bit colour
  • DirectX: Version 5.2
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Sound Card: All DirectX-compatible sound cards

short_description: Stellar Mess is a point&click 2D graphic adventure game with retro style, where the least likely hero must rescue the princess and save the galaxy from a tyrannical Stellar Armada. All this while walking through a small town located somewhere in the Argentinian Patagonia.
